name: One Shot (itch) (ruinthread-games)
description:
You are a lone Shinobi attempting to escape an evil fortress filled with demonic Samurai armed only with his bow and a single arrow! Will you gain the upper hand in your struggle to survive by cunningly using portals to create shortcuts through space? Or will you succumb to terror and seek refuge in your own personal pocket dimension?

Use W,S,A,D to move, number keys to select portals and click LMB to place a portal. Hold down RMB to aim your bow and fire with LMB when fully charged.

The game and all assets were made for the What-A-Jam! Game Jam 2021 over the course of 8 days.

Unfortunately I ran out of time, there are lots of things I would still like to have done but the game should be in a fully playable state. The game was made using the Godot Engine.
